title: (x) Motovision Racing.com - Blahaus {Heinrich}
content:
Hi   
   
All   
   
Can anyone identify this font, and can anyone tell me if there is any tool to detect or identify a font in a image(jpeg or gif )   
   
Best Regards   
   
Shaik   
 ![image](http://web.archive.org/web/20110228235328im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/11931.jpg)
author: shaik

comments.content:
Thanks Heinrich Lischka for you info.   
   
Best Regards   
   
Shaik

Try [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20110228235328/http:/myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/).   
   
No ID right away. I'll keep an eye out.

No need for Whatthefont when you have typografski around ;)   
Nice catch, Heinrich!
